title: Chapter 1089 - An Exchange
body:
Chapter 1089 - An Exchange

Wang Zhongyuan came to a sudden-stop mid-charge.

The leader of the Middle Province Wang Family was covered in wounds, and his hair was disheveled.

When he saw the cage break beneath a single slash, he sighed in relief, but a moment later, he was overcome with astonishment and bewilderment.

Did that person just call himself… Su Xuanjun!?

Wang Zhongyuan’s scalp went numb. He stood there, rooted to the spot, as if he’d been struck by lightning.

The white-haired old man and the Wang Family higher-ups following him were similarly astonished. Their expressions shifted as they realized that this didn’t bode well.

Xie Yunchuan tensed up, his expression suddenly grave.

The golden-robed old man whipped around. When he looked at the blue-robed young man who’d descended like a deity visiting the mundane world, his eyes frosted over.

“M-Master?” Wang Que could no longer stop himself from calling out.

The blue-robed young man standing in the distance didn’t look like the master he remembered, but the disposition and charm he revealed with every gesture were a perfect match!

Furthermore, Wang Que could already see that his sixth and eighth junior apprentice brothers, Ye Luo and Bai Yi, were following the young man in blue.

Wang Que was instantly certain that...
